name: Student Applicant Center Preference
query:
SELECT 
    ECP.parent ,
    ECP.center_name ,
    ECP.center ,
    ECP.districts ,
    COUNT(ECP.center)
FROM 
    `tabExam Centre Preference` ECP
RIGHT JOIN 
    `tabStudent Applicant` SA
ON 
    ECP.parent = SA.name 
WHERE 
    SA.docstatus = 1 AND
    SA.application_status = "Applied" AND
    SA.academic_year = %(academic_year)s AND
    SA.academic_term = %(academic_term)s AND
    SA.department = "School of Services - WSC" AND
    SA.program_grade = "Long Term Course" 
GROUP BY ECP.center
